item.title: Icon Sprites with Compass
item.description: Manually creating sprite images is time-consuming and subject to human error. The corresponding CSS is often verbose and largely repetitive. Solution: Leverage Compass’s spriting and looping features. Example: You have an icon set of 20 10x10px individual .png files. Their file names follow the convention icon_1.png, icon_2.png, and icon_3.png through icon_20.png. Step 1: Install compass gem install compass Step 2: Create a compass project compass create your_project_name Step 3: Configure compass spriting In the case of the aforementioned, example, youâ€™ll want to configure compass to build a sprite from the directory containing the icons.
